name: pistachio
content:
pistachio noun
(NUT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] (also pistachio nut) a nut with a hard shell containing a green seed that can be eaten: The pastries were sprinkled with crushed pistachio.
Maryna Iaroshenko/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

pistachio noun
(COLOUR)
[ U ] (also pistachio green) a pale green colour
desifoto/DigitalVision Vectors/GettyImages

pistachio adjective
(FLAVOUR )
made of or containing pistachio nuts: We adored the pistachio ice cream and passion fruit. I finished the evening with a pistachio gelato and walked back to the hotel in the rain.
More examplesFewer examplesRemove from the heat, add the pistachio paste, and stir to dissolve.Vanilla, coffee, and pistachio flavourings are widely accepted and used in kitchens.I remember your wonderful pistachio cookies with almond flour.

pistachio adjective
(COLOUR)
having a pale green colour: a pistachio silk shirt The models wore long, silky gowns in pistachio green.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's a wide avenue lined with town houses in pastel blue, pistachio, and pink.Our waiter gives us a tiny pistachio coloured box of cereal.

an edible green nut with a hard shell
Pistachio is also a pale green color.
